Raid Readiness Checklist

Health and/or mana potions. Consumables here work, as well.
Gear enchanted and socketed.
Addons installed and updated.
Buff food.
Gear repaired.
Able to communicate on Discord voice.

The Wildcards Raid Team
  • Our Parent: Currently Offline

  • Subscribe to our news feed via RSS

Documentation and guides for the World of Warcraft raid team, the Wildcards. Part of the Currently Offline guild on the US server, Sargeras.
